<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>
##<.*?mages/fullcolor.png.*?>

	{	title: '都市言情', type: 3},
	{	title: '穿越历史', type: 4},
	{	title: '科幻灵异', type: 5},
	{	title: '  藏经阁  ', type: 6},
	{	title: '其他类别', type: 7}
]
//排序
novelRank = [
	{ title: '  更新  ', type: 'lastupdate'},
	{ title: '总人气', type: 'allvisit'},
	{ title: '月人气', type: 'monthvisit'},
	{ title: '  字数  ', type: 'size'},
	{ title: '  新书  ', type: 'postdate'}
]

list = [];
formatUrl = (sort, rank, state) => {
	return `{{eval(String(source.loginUrl));_getUrl();}}shuku/${sort}-${rank}-${state}-{{page}}.html`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (stateItem of novelState) {
	pushItem(`🚫小说状态---${stateItem.title}🚫`, "", 1);
	for (rankItem of novelRank) {
		novelSort[0].title = "📫" + rankItem.title;
		for (sortItem of novelSort) {
			pushItem(`${sortItem.title}`, formatUrl(sortItem.type, rankItem.type, stateItem.type), sortItem.type > 5 ? 0.45 : 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>
header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleContent.content:
content = { childNode: [], // 子节点数组 childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/) ? java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray() : "", // 根据匹配到的nrid获取子节点数组 UpWz: function(m, i) { // 定义UpWz函数，根据传入的参数进行计算返回值 var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); // 对(i+1)与code取模并向上取整 k = Math.ceil(m - k); // 对m减去k并向上取整 return k; }, load: function() { // 加载函数 this.code = String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; // 获取code值 var e = String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); // 对字符串进行base64解码并按一定分隔符分割成数组 for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { // 遍历数组 var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); // 调用UpWz函数计算出k值 this.childNode[k] = this.childNodes[i]; // 将计算后的值作为索引，将对应的子节点存入childNode数组 } } } if(baseUrl.match(/verify/)){ result = "如果没获取到目录，说明验证码不对，详情页刷新重新获取验证码"; } else { if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result = content.childNode.join("
"); } else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result = java.getElements("#articlecontent@p"); } else { // 加载外部JS文件 cryptojs_min.js eval(String(java.ajax("http://danmeirouwen.net/17mb/js/jquery-1.9.1.min.js"))); // 定义函数d(a, b)用于解密操作 function d(a, b) { // 将b进行MD5加密并转换为字符串 b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); // 提取加密后字符串的前16位和后面部分作为iv和参数创建对象 var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); // 使用AES解密算法对a进行解密，并将结果转换为字符串格式 return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8); } // 使用正则表达式匹配出来的信息作为参数调用函数d，并将结果赋值给result变量 result = eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); } }

<js>

href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#container@p") }else{ {{java.importScript("http://danmeirouwen.net/17mb/js/cryptojs_min.js")}} function d(a, b) { b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8) } result = eval(result.match(/cont=(d\(".*"\));/)[1]) }}

<js>

$=last[last.length-1];
vip=$.isvip?'💰':'';

vip+chapterid+'、'+chaptername+' '+date}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束

content=java.getElement("$.content");
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody");
say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话要说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){
result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>
ruleContent.replaceRegex:
##【普通用户、初级.*用户所发评论将在审核通过后显示！】|【为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*
|(感谢灌溉)[\w\W]+(.).*感谢(灌|投|支持).*|感谢(在|为).*小天使.*|.*(扔|投|砸|灌)了.*时间.*|.*\\d瓶.*|.*(扔|投|砸|灌|谢).*(手榴弹|营养液|地雷|浅水炸弹|深水炸弹|深水鱼雷|火箭炮|投雷|霸王票).*|非常感谢.*努力的.*

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=["标   签::::1",

"互攻::互攻::4::a",
"快穿::快穿::4::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

}

<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

				}

<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>
